Summary Note:
Julia Daantje Maassen and the RM crossed paths at a mutual friend's dinner party in Amsterdam. They discovered they had many common acquaintances and decided to explore business opportunities together.
Julia Daantje Maassen is a 27 year old Assistant Designer from Netherlands.
Attracted by Julius Baer's reputation for excellence, she chose to join for the bespoke financial solutions offered.
Family Background: Julia Daantje Maassen and Bakker tied the knot in 2024. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Julia obtained her secondary school diploma from Bonaventura College Leiden in 2015.
She then attended Utrecht University, which she graduated in 2021.
Occupation History:
Julia Daantje Maassen is a 27 year old Assistant Designer from Netherlands.
At G-Star Raw C.V., Julia Daantje Maassen held the position of Assistant Designer from 2022 to 2025, developing essential skills in the field.
Wealth Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 20000 EUR.
Client does not have any properties.She inherited 2460000 EUR from her grandfather, a well-known Investment Banker, in 2018, allowing her to expand her investment portfolio.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Julia as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
